name: Text Connections
tag_list: sms, text-messaging, emergency-messaging, community-connect, mobile-marketing, sms-gateway, sms-aggregation-
overview:
TxC has been in the messaging business for over 15 years, first helping hundreds of business and government organizations develop software to send directly to the pager/cell phone carriers. Today we help the cellular carriers distribute these exciting services to the following fields: entertainment, business and emergency (first responders.)

Our preference is helping charities, nonprofit, religious and youth organizations succeed through SMS.

SMS is a simple technology when you really look at it.. It’s just sending and receiving messages from/to cell phones. It’s what one does with that, and the manner in which it’s done, that makes the difference. Text Connections is one of only a couple companies that recognizes these different applications of SMS. We have been in this business since its inception here in the U.S.
